This vignette provides a brief guide to the basic usage of `grpreg`.

# Linear regression

To illustrate, let's set up the data:

```{r}
library(grpreg)
data(Birthwt)
X <- Birthwt$X
y <- Birthwt$bwt
group <- Birthwt$group
fit <- grpreg(X,y,group,penalty="grLasso")
plot(fit)
fit <- grpreg(X,y,group,penalty="grMCP")
plot(fit)
fit <- grpreg(X,y,group,penalty="grSCAD")
plot(fit)
fit <- grpreg(X,y,group,penalty="gel")
plot(fit)
fit <- grpreg(X,y,group,penalty="cMCP")
plot(fit)
select(fit,"AIC")
```
